title: Spare Pistol
desc:
Post 112
- Fire the shotgun at a player until they are hit with a non-safe round.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - Fire the shotgun at yourself until you are hit with a non-safe round if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
_ _
